mapper.insert: insert into b_corpMember_tbl(c_idx, c_id, c_pw, c_dname,c_dphone,c_demail,c_name,c_zipcode,c_address, c_intro,c_type,c_code,c_regdate,c_auth,c_connect) values (B_CORPMEMBER_SEQ.nextval, #{c_id},#{c_pw},#{c_dname},#{c_dphone},#{c_demail},#{c_name},#{c_zipcode} ,#{c_address},#{c_intro},#{c_type},#{c_code},sysdate,'corp',0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from b_corpMember_tbl where c_id = #{c_id}
select * from b_corpMember_tbl where c_id= #{c_id} and c_pw=#{c_pw}
